title: FloatingRateIndexCalculationDefaults
description: This holds the rate calculation defaults applicable for a floating rate index.

category.description: The ISDA FRO category (e.g. screen rate or calculated rate).

indexStyle.description: The ISDA FRO style (e.g. term rate, swap rate, etc).

method.description: The ISDA FRO calculation method (e.g. OIS Compounding).
